lead_paragraph: LUBOW--Joyce S. Passed away peacefully at home. Very beloved wife of 60 years to Nathan M. Lubow, adoring mother of Andrew M. Lubow and Susan M. Russak, Idolized grandmother of Shai Russak, Tali Lev, Yaniv Russak and Sarah E. Lubow, loving great-grandmother of Leo Lev. Avid world traveler and devoted educator of special needs children. Services to be held at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel on July 7, 2016 at 11am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LUBOW, JOYCE S
